pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, October 13, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Golden Horseshoe Region, Ontario

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local steel mill. Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne and Minister responsible for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario Filomena Tassi will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will highlight investments in Canadian clean innovation. Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne and Minister responsible for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario Filomena Tassi will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with skilled workers and apprentices at a union training centre. Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry François-Philippe Champagne and Minister responsible for the Federal Economic Development Agency for Southern Ontario Filomena Tassi will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
